topic: Interpersonal Business Communication Skills im Curriculum

correspondence.message: Hello, I would like to know why the course "Interpersonal Business Communication Skills" is not part of the curriculum of the degree program "Computer Science: Games Engineering - Master of Science". I have seen that other courses are classified under "Elective Modules Interdisciplinary Basics". Was this course deliberately excluded and if it is inadvertently not part of the curriculum: is it possible to take the course this semester and have it credited?"
Hello, this event has not been excluded. Please find out more here: https://www.cit.tum.de/cit/studium/studierende/ueberfachliche-grundlagen/
